official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the United States Postal Service from acquiring neighborhood delivery and collection box units and apartment house mail receptacles for public use.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service from acquiring neighborhood delivery and collection box units or apartment house mail receptacles for public use.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the United States Postal Service from acquiring neighborhood delivery and collection box units and apartment house mail receptacles for public use.
